sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BASS2300 ( DPOB_CD , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_NM , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_DAY_DYS , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_MN_DYS , DTIL_OCCLS_APPTN_UCST_CD , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_UCST_SUM , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_BGNN_DT , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_END_DT , TYP_OCCU_CD , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_JBFML_CD , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_SEPT_CTNT , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_CD , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_SMLR_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #busnDtlTypOccuCd# , #busnDtlTypOccuNm# , #busnDtlTypOccuDayDys# , #busnDtlTypOccuMnDys# , #dtilOcclsApptnUcstCd# , #busnDtlTypOccuUcstSum# , #busnDtlTypOccuBgnnDt# , #busnDtlTypOccuEndDt# , #typOccuCd# , #dtilOccuInttnCd# , #busnDtlTypOccuJbfmlCd# , #busnDtlTypOccuSeptCtnt# , #busnTypOccuCifiCd# , #busnTypOccuCifiSmlrCd# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BASS2300 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD=#busnDtlTypOccuCd# , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_NM=#busnDtlTypOccuNm# , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_DAY_DYS=#busnDtlTypOccuDayDys# , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_MN_DYS=#busnDtlTypOccuMnDys# , DTIL_OCCLS_APPTN_UCST_CD=#dtilOcclsApptnUcstCd# , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_UCST_SUM=#busnDtlTypOccuUcstSum# , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_BGNN_DT=#busnDtlTypOccuBgnnDt# , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_END_DT=#busnDtlTypOccuEndDt# , TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd# , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD=#dtilOccuInttnCd# , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_JBFML_CD=#busnDtlTypOccuJbfmlCd# , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_SEPT_CTNT=#busnDtlTypOccuSeptCtnt# , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_CD=#busnTypOccuCifiCd# , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_SMLR_CD=#busnTypOccuCifiSmlrCd# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD=#busnDtlTypOccuCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM BASS2300 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD=#busnDtlTypOccuCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_NM , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_DAY_DYS , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_MN_DYS , DTIL_OCCLS_APPTN_UCST_CD , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_UCST_SUM , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_BGNN_DT , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_END_DT , TYP_OCCU_CD , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_JBFML_CD , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_SEPT_CTNT , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_CD , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_SMLR_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS2300 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD=#busnDtlTypOccuCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_NM , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_DAY_DYS , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_MN_DYS , DTIL_OCCLS_APPTN_UCST_CD , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_UCST_SUM , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_BGNN_DT , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_END_DT , TYP_OCCU_CD , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_JBFML_CD , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_SEPT_CTNT , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_CD , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_SMLR_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS2300 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS2300 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
BUSN_DTL_TYP_OCCU_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
